## get() function

A utility function to get the current value from a given store. It works by subscribing to a store, capturing the value (synchronously) and unsubscribing just after.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function get<T>(store: SubscribableStore<T>): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  store | [SubscribableStore](./ngx-tansu.subscribablestore.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | a store from which the current value is retrieved. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

## Example


```typescript
const myStore = writable(1);
console.log(get(myStore)); // logs 1

```
